website_summaries.verdict: A combination U lock that's easy to set up and use and won't be easily broken.
pros: Can purchase with or without bike cable
Easy to install and set the combination
cons: This is a smaller lock and the cable is shorter than some were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy materials. I love that you can fix it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy materials. I love that you can fix it on your bike and it hardly gets forgotten. My only complaint is that it shows numbered code on both sides of the lock. So if someone is looking at you when you're locking/unlocking, he/she can see the combination from the other side of the lock (if you're not careful; and the numbers are big). I'd recommend you put dark tape on the other side to cover the numbers. Overall, it's great value for the price and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Witawas Handee

customer_reviews.title: I still went with it because it was the cheapest option and had some good reviews. The first lock I purchased was awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these locks a while ago, and although some of the reviews said it sometimes didn't open, I still went with it because it was the cheapest option and had some good reviews. The first lock I purchased was awesome! I use it all the time. I bought another lock for another bike and after only a few uses this one stopped working. Now I can't even open it, it's ridiculous! I'm scared that I will not be able to get the lock off of my bike, so now I just don't even use it. It's a shame. I would say if your lock starts acting funky at all, return it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: ECannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for scooters
customer_reviews.text: We bought this specifically for my son's scooter at school. We noticed that someone had already tried to steal it from the bike stands when we used a regular chain so we tried this. PERFECT! Its small and compact enough to fit in his back pack without weighing him down too much, easy to use for his little 9 year old self, and fits perfectly without allowing the scooter wheels to slip through. Perfect for your kids who've invested a mint in their scooters :)
customer_reviews.author: Miss T

customer_reviews.title: Love the combo lock
customer_reviews.text: I warn drawn in by the color, and the rubbery material that prevents metal on metal scratching. The combination was easy to set and even easier to use. I love not needing a key every time I go to un/lock my bike. The convenient mount is fantastic. If you don't click it in all the way it will slide out, but this only happens every once in a while. I purchased the 14mm lock, and I will admit it it just too small to lock your frame and tire to something. I've had the lock for a year and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: E L.

customer_reviews.title: One of my best AMZ purchase ever 😂
customer_reviews.text: Miracles do exist, this item is one of them. Needed something to lock the fridge as my dad suffers Alzheimer's and keeps eating uncontrollably. This did the trick. We tried so many things before this that were just complicated. BIG WHITE NUMBERS are GREAT Long Neck is perfect size. Color is super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with lock!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good, solid lock. Really smooth to work, easy to disengage and then lock. It's not a large u-lock but it does the trick, especially with attached cable. I mostly lock up my bike when running short errands so I'm not using the cable much but it's handy to have! Seller is very responsive and I highly recommend! BTW, I wasn't familiar with attaching the u-lock carrier device so I watched a YouTube video and it ended up being really simple, especially with my handy li'l cordless drill - literally took seconds!
customer_reviews.author: King KEn

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL PRODUCT, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lock that was durable and lightweight and this lock matches that description. Though I don't find a use for the cable that it comes with, being that its a bit too short. I know that no lock will be able to resist bolt cutters, but the lock itself is pretty sturdy, I went at it with a hammer and it didn't pop off. I also like the fact that it's a combination lock, so no keys. You may have to put a little effort into tightening the frame on your bike, but my only regret is that I didn't get it in green.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: good little lock.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun lock and my 7 year old son loves the color and the combination rather than a key - but it is a bit small. You can lock the frame to a rack, but if you want to lock the front wheel too, you definitely need the cable. The cable is nice and thick, but still lightweight. I have not yet tried the attachment for storing the lock on the frame. There is not a lot of room on this 20" bike so I'm not yet sure where to put it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Just like a bike lock, except smaller
customer_reviews.text: It works, but tiny and I'm not sure I'd trust it with much. Very compact and easy to carry on the bike or in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: MW149

customer_reviews.title: Bike stolen within a couple weeks :(
customer_reviews.text: Bough this new lock thinking it would be more secure, but now I'm bike-less as someone stole my bike secured using this lock :( DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised. Makes locking hard.
customer_reviews.text: The u lock itself works well, but it is quite small. The combination is handy instead of keys. However, with the lock being small, and most of all, the cable being less than 3 inches although advertised as 4 inches (yup, I measured it), I will be returning this product. It's simply not large enough (either part) to easily lock to poles and bike stands when out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and a good deal for the price. My only complaint is the cheap plastic holder. The part which you attach to the U piece reduces the width of the post which you are able to lock your bike onto. Also, its just such low quality that I would never trust it to not fall apart when biking over a bumpy road. The manufacturer should get rid of the holder, and charge the customer 3 cents less, which I imagine is what it cost to make the holder.
customer_reviews.author: vagabondscott

customer_reviews.title: Great bike lock
customer_reviews.text: The bike attachment tries to accommodate different bikes and the Zip-tie fingers are too long for mine. I could cut some length but decided to use a zip tie to fix them in place (see photo). The combination can be changed. If you do not think the cord is necessary, maybe the lock only option makes everything tidy. The lock can be removed from the attachment by pushing the button, very good design.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open after a couple of months use.
customer_reviews.text: After about 1 -2 months usage the lock would repeatedly get stuck closed. I fixed the problem by oiling the lock, but the problem returns every so often. Otherwise, I like this lock even though it's a little bit smaller than most U-Locks I've used over the years. I'm stuck with it and will continue to use it, but I felt the need to put that information out there.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Leplae

customer_reviews.title: Very small opening
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock, easy to reset the code and use, but the opening is very small and barely fits around my bike and the bike post. I also selected this lock among the other ones because it had a mount for my bike, but the mount is clearly the cheapest and least functional part of the lock. It does not fit snug and has to hang from the top horizontal bar of the bike and not vertically like my last bike lock. It does what I bought it do so 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first one works fine, the latest ones jams and is hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one 5 months before ordering another. The first one works fine, the latest ones jams and is hard to open. I checked for debris and defects but could not find a cause for the jamming. Edit, previously 2 stars: The seller replaced the lock.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let this happen to you!
customer_reviews.text: The lock is amazing. Love it! Make sure you use it right. I did not run the U part through the frame and in under 10 seconds (per video survellience) my lock cable was cut with an electric hand saw and the bike was gone.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Stops working!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the lock will stop working after a while. Please take heed to similar reviews stating the same thing. I learned my lesson the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: ashley16

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and use, I like the foam coating on the U, it doesn't mark up my bike or make noise, while transporting on the back of my car. However, the holder piece is a neat idea, to carry the lock while riding the bike (not important for my use), but it does not fit over the foam coating, so I find that piece is flawed and needs a little re-engineering.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brownfield

customer_reviews.title: its strong
customer_reviews.text: after having a few bicycles stolen even when they have a lock. I think this lock so far worked better than anyone I had before. so far so good,
customer_reviews.author: nariman

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. For the money, it's a great lock. Very easy to use, lightweight, portable. Just be warned that when you receive it and you're setting the combination, the combination mechanism is quite sensitive. I ended up accidentally setting it to a number I didn't want, but it doesn't matter because I've memorized it and it works. Once a number is set, I have no idea how you would change it. I assume there's some way.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I wasn't paying attention, but this is about half the size of the u locks you see in the bicycle shops. Basically too small to secure most bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Basementcleanup

customer_reviews.title: Lock works great, well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time. Lock works great and has a durable coating on the shank to protect it from scratching your bike or whatever your using it for. Make sure you note the size of this item. The lock is large but I think it gives you more flexibility in use. We needed a large lock to be able to lock the doors on the refrig ( safety for kids ). Easy to set the code also. Would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing a screw and I don’t feel safe using it. Each previous mode has lasted about a year or two before becoming too “sticky” to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great lock. A little smaller than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great lock. A little smaller than I wanted, as I can't lock up my front tire + frame to a bike rack with only the u-lock but it does have the extra cable which comes in handy. A little on the cheap side but the combo lock in convenient and no issues so far! If I had a more expensive bike, I would spend a little extra and get some that would be a little more secure.
customer_reviews.author: KB RN

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size mount
customer_reviews.text: The mount does not fit, I have tried everything to squeeze these two parts together and put the screw and bolt on, no way. Too small. How am I supposed to mount on my bike?? Not happy
customer_reviews.author: colleen mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Bracket doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: So the lock itself is great, but the reason I am giving this one star is I specifically bought this lock because it had a mounting bracket-- there were a lot of other good locks I could get for less expensive, just without the bracket. But the bracket is not usuable...it doesn't tighten enough to fit on my bike, and the most frustrating thing is that the hole for the lock itself is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wills

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock but won't protect against real thieves
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to use but perhaps too easy. I locked my bike to a post with this and I lost it. I blame the lock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Reset on the lock easily identifiable.
customer_reviews.text: This lock allows you to reset the passcode on the lock. If you don’t want your bike stolen don’t buy this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to much higher priced locks.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with both the item and the seller I bought this from. I keep my bike inside at night. I live in a high crime area but I do use this lock a lot when I'm out and about during the day/early evening. It has kept my bike safe without fail. I recommend it. Works great for the security I need.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working soon after bought it
customer_reviews.text: Lock was great at first but within a month it was getting sticky and harder to open. Often you'd have to try 10-15 times of pulling down to pull it in just the right way for it to open. Finally it got stuck closed and we haven't been able to get the lock off. Will need to cut off and buy a different type of lock. Very unhappy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind for my bike!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously heavy duty lock and cable. The included cable make it easy to keep my entire bike secure. I feel comfortable leaving my bike unattended with this lock and cable.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: The chain was super efficient, smooth
customer_reviews.text: The chain was super efficient,smooth ,and useful. I would recommend it to anyone. In fact, my brother just ordered one and it's coming in 2 days. At first I was super skeptical because it was so cheap, but it actually works way better than most of the other locks I've bought. In fact, it's way more stable and secure than some much more pricey locks. I would recommend this to everyone!! It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fan

customer_reviews.title: Lock was defective and it wont open now!
customer_reviews.text: I used the lock after resetting it and it totally worked and the next thing I put it on my bike and it just wont open up now. I checked it after resetting so its not like it would have had not reset properly. I dont know what to so since Lumintrails website says there is no other way to get this to open. HOW DO I GET MY BIKE BACK NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Muheet Bharti

customer_reviews.title: I wish the cable was longer
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself seems to be decent quality. It feels sturdy. It's easy to lock and unlock. Setting the combination is easy. The lock isn't big enough to put it on both the front wheel and the frame, so you need the included cable (or one like it) if you want to secure both of those parts of your bike. However, the cable isn't long enough to secure both wheels and the frame, so you may want to upgrade to a longer cable. The mounting bracket feels somewhat cheap, but it doesn't have any trouble holding the lock onto the frame. This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: You get what is advertised. I am using it as a gate lock not for a bike. For an expensive bike I would want a more secure lock. But for an average kids bike this would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Thomason

customer_reviews.title: The lock mechanism was bad. Cannot open it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought several. After just 2 weeks, 2 of them can not be open . One of them is still on my fence as i cannot open it. Will have to find a tool to cut the lock -- lots of work.
customer_reviews.author: patt

customer_reviews.title: strong
customer_reviews.text: The cable they give you is a size wider than most other brands. It won't stop the thieves, but will slow them down.
customer_reviews.author: GaryK.

customer_reviews.title: small than I thought, but it does make it a little more convenient to carry around
customer_reviews.text: -small than I thought, but it does make it a little more convenient to carry around -works well -good quality -5 stars
customer_reviews.author: AZH

customer_reviews.title: Feel secure that your bike will still be there when you return.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this lock. I plan on buying two more, one for my bike and another for my husbands bike.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Great lock.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about three months now with no issues. The cable can be cut with a side cutters, or hacksaw very quick, but i got it for the lock. It locks perfect around my front tubes, so i dont have to use a holder of any kind thankfully. You may not be soo lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, bad attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Good lock that doesn't require a key, but the bike attachment is really poor. The strap juts out and can rub against your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Matias

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I’m securing my canoes to my trailer with the lock and cable. I’m waiting to see what happens when it’s exposed to the elements. I’m very happy with the strength and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping around for a lock for my bike and found this one. It arrived on time. The lock is simple to use, yet sturdy enough to bring peace of mind. Password is easy to reset. The lock has nice smooth finish. Very happy with the purchase. Good experience with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Donyou want someone to walk of a/your bike?!? Two thumbs!! Does what it’s supposed to do. Seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.author: lucas mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to secure an outboard engine to the transom of my sail boat. Safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike lock!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this bike lock!! It’s a little heavy, but it works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Lucas

customer_reviews.title: It seems like they didn't account for the plastic casing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The mounting piece (displayed as the black piece next to the lock) does not actually fit on the lock. It seems like they didn't account for the plastic casing on the "u" part of the lock when they made the mounting piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bicycle Lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to put on and take off. The combination mechanism is nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Won't lock completely
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will do the job, but doesn't lock in completely on one side. The other side is locked in well and the bad side is in far enough that I doubt it can be pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock wonder how bolt cutters would work?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to change lock number, just make sure your. Centered on numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike Lock..
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bike lock! Very sturdy and easy to use. Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Darcy

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: this lock works just as expected... and the cable is even long enough that when my wife and I go riding together we can lock both bikes up with just the 1 lock.
customer_reviews.author: RSullivan

customer_reviews.title: No code works.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to even set the lock or what the code is.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pineault

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: We keep several bikes locked outside our condo. We keep one bike separate from the others with this lock (because I use it to bike to work every morning). One morning we woke up and all the bikes had been stolen- except the one locked with this lock! Well worth the $24.99. The bikes chained with cheaper locks were all gone!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: THEIF BROKE LOCK AND STOLE MY BIKE
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but doesn’t protect against bike thieves! They cut through this lock like it was nothing and stole my expensive mountain bike!! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Profen

customer_reviews.title: so good! I've had no issues with this lock
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I've had no issues with this lock, and it is serving the purpose for why I bought it. I wish they would design this exact lock, just the extend 10 or 12" version also so you could get the front tire all in one.
customer_reviews.author: MKrueger

customer_reviews.title: Thank you !!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to lock the gate to my fence ! Worked beautifully! And shipped immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: MARTHA A. VAUGHAN

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s adorable! Stop buying cable locks and invest in u-locks!
customer_reviews.author: Shley

customer_reviews.title: The lock is very easy to use and comes open very smoothly when the ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock is very easy to use and comes open very smoothly when the combination is put in. But like other people have said -- it's so small!! Almost too small to be super useful
customer_reviews.author: Recent college grad

customer_reviews.title: Thieves look for easier locks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Have 4 and LOVE they are all same combo. Wish cable was longer.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The plastic thing to attach the lock to your bike is very cheap. It broke when I tried to use my screwdriver. It also has a pretty bad design. It fell on the ground and now it won't unlock anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Varsha

customer_reviews.title: Combo is great
customer_reviews.text: Look is a little small( hard to get around larger poles) but works great.
customer_reviews.author: chad libutti

customer_reviews.title: Great combination package
customer_reviews.text: Great combination package! The U-Lock works perfectly, it's very easy to set, and the cable provided is the perfect length to lock up any bike!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: This U lock with cable is Holy strike!
customer_reviews.text: You know what? I orderd three times because my buddys keep ask me to buy it after they see my lock. Five star!
customer_reviews.author: Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good for the price but I wanted a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: xris

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and quick to respond. Nice product at a good price. Can’t say enough about how well they service their customers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Malibujace

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but crappy mounting piece
customer_reviews.text: Great lock but the plastic part that wraps around the bike broke within 3 days of use :( would be nice if I could just replace that part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and would recommend it highly! Love it And it even came with a mounting strap for on your bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cable is not long enough to lock both wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrian Liang

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and works great. Be careful which side you set the code ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works great. Be careful which side you set the code on as BOTH sides look like it could be the front of you’re on a hurry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an attentive seller.
customer_reviews.text: Set the combination 0000. The lock did not open. Why do not you check your product?
customer_reviews.author: Basir

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Sized Mount; Cannot Use
customer_reviews.text: The locks works fine, but the mounting bracket was the wrong size, missing a screw, and did not fit where it was supposed to. Happy to change my review if I'm sent a mounting bracket that fits this lock as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Elli Davtyan

customer_reviews.title: Wears out in less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these locks and after a year both were getting stuck and did not work well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: The U lock is a convenient size but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: The U lock is a convenient size but it does limit what it can be attached to because of its smaller size. However, the cord does help solve that issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent lock but is very unsturdy and lasted only about a year.
customer_reviews.text: The lock no longer works after about a year. It's a bit rickety and unsturdy but will work for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lanz16

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, easy to use and keyless . Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lock, love the color. Very easy to create lock combo, works well sofar, thank you so much!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got my bike stolen with this chain.
customer_reviews.text: I got my bike stolen with this chain. It appears that it is easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Paz

customer_reviews.title: She loved it, just a little heavier than we expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Daughter. She loved it, just a little heavier than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use. & Excellent lock for the value!
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid lock and pretty easy to set the combination. So, there is no need to carry a key!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S.

customer_reviews.title: Security at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I use it to secure a rolling gate to my property. Now I feel more secure.
customer_reviews.author: SYW

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks and feels sturdy. Fast shipping, too. I received mine quickly.
customer_reviews.author: D&S

customer_reviews.title: ... - but at the same time that's kind of nice it helps my bike stand up nice
customer_reviews.text: A little small - but at the same time that's kind of nice it helps my bike stand up nice.
customer_reviews.author: MAX THE AMAZON KING

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy to use and secure enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: cla

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use. Very strong and hard to break.
customer_reviews.author: Flying

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice quality lock and easy to use with code.
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really fast and the lock works great. Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: need only 4 digits to remember - resettable
customer_reviews.text: everything as described - easy to set the numbers -
customer_reviews.author: smmonroe

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a good lock. I chose it for the combination
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a good lock. I chose it for the combination...because I'm not into keys in the 21st century. Where I'm disappointed is with the mount. It can't be used on the smaller diameter parts of the frame. Anyone know of a good mount I can get for this that will? Found one!:  Photo with seperate mount used to hold lock...
customer_reviews.author: TX1

customer_reviews.title: great lock
customer_reviews.text: Nice and good quality looking, specially the circle rubber which can hold the lock when don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good use, easy to open, fashion design. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program combination
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality lock. Easy to program combination
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed...
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than I thought it would be, it can't really go through the bike frame, and tire, and a post. The color is not as bright as I thought it would be. The cable it comes with is short. AND I no longer use this lock because if you forget to twist the numbers, the bottom part of the lock falls off as you ride away! It was nice to have the combo pad rather, than a key, but ultimately dysfunctional!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: This lock put me in a jam..
customer_reviews.text: On the first day that I used this lock it became jammed on my bike and had to be cut off. Additionally, it is INCREDIBLY easy to break this lock by cutting through the locking mechanism. If I could leave 0 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bowerman

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the mounting bracket. There is a piece that sticks out once you've gotten it secured. Also the shape of the bracket only works well on a certain shape of bike frame, less round and a little more oblong. Bike lock works great, but it is less neon than it looks like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Caughey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these. 2 of them got stuck within 2 months and could not open them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: It's kind of small. Check the dimensions and what ...
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of small. Check the dimensions and what you'll need before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: My bike got stolen while attached to this lock, ...
customer_reviews.text: My bike got stolen while attached to this lock, the thief cut through the cable. There are more durable locks out there which you should consider if you're bike is in an area prone to bike thieves. Perhaps the green color made it stand out too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Graybill

customer_reviews.title: May work in some areas?
customer_reviews.text: The U-lock element does not provide a high level of security. May be good as a deterrent in places with minimal bicycle theft? Could be acceptable if you are within eyesight I suppose, but here in the Los Angeles area, this thing doesn't stand a chance against would-be thieves. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk E. Honda

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I forgot my password and there is not way to reset the password so I throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Tonio

product_meta.title: Lumintrail Bicycle Combination U-Lock 14mm with Mounting Bracket and Optional 4-Foot Braided Steel Security Cable
feature_bullets: Hefty 14mm hardened high-grade steel shackle resists cutting, prying, or jacking
4 number resettable combination lock so you don't have to worry about bringing your keys
Rubber-coated crossbar cover protects paint and finishes of our bike
Includes Quick-release frame mounted multi-position carry bracket
100% satisfaction guaranteed – Industry Leading Lifetime Warranty!
